Specifications.Temperature Rating:
Thermal Experience Index Rating: 4 (-15°C to -25°C)
The Thermal Experience Index(TEI): Canada Goose' five-point system is designed to help you make the right selection from their expansive collections of Winter Apparel.
Specifications.Materials: [outer shell] 192 GSM, Arctic-Tech 85% Polyester/15% Cotton blend with a DWR finish
Specifications.Water Resistance: DWR finish (Durable Water Repellent) helps repel water from fabric surface
Specifications.Pockets: 2 zippered exterior fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, 1 Napoleon style pocket with zipper closure, 1 interior security pocket
Specifications.Fit:
Slim Fit
Fusion Fit: slightly slimmer chest and arms
